title: As others see us: a look at interpersonal relations
creator_credit: Salenger Educational Media and Monte Young
brief_description: An animated film which examines self-image by feedback; exploring the reasons why people see us differently from how we see ourselves. Provides examples of how relationships can be improved by openness and how to obtain positive feedback to enhance effective communication and interpersonal relationships.
